doc:
Christopher Holden https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Holden 0 Christopher William Holden (born December 26, 1974) is an American-Canadian actor and assistant director, son of actors Glen Corbett and Adrienne Ellis. Younger brother of actress Laurie Holden (The X-Files, Silent Hill, The Mist, The Walking Dead). His stepfather is Academy Award-nominated director Michael Anderson (director) (Around the World in 80 Days, Logan's Run). Christopher Holden is a producer in Toronto which he packages Scripts to Stars and Distributors. Christopher_William_Holden ( born December_26_,_1974 ) is an_American-Canadian_actor and assistant_director , son of actors_Glen_Corbett and Adrienne_Ellis . Younger_brother of actress_Laurie_Holden ( The_X-Files , Silent_Hill , The_Mist , The_Walking_Dead_) . His_stepfather is Academy_Award-nominated_director_Michael_Anderson ( director_) ( Around the_World in 80_Days , Logan 's_Run_) . Christopher_Holden is a_producer in Toronto which he packages Scripts to Stars_and_Distributors .
